MovieTitle.description: Provide a concise title for the movie, not more than 3 to 5 words.

NarrationScript.description: Provide narration text for the segment, which will be used as a background audio narration for each segment.

ImagePrompts.description: Provide an image prompt for the image generator. First image is the starting image and each subsequent image is the end image for a segment. Each segment starts with the ending image of the prior segment.

VideoPrompts.description: Provide a video prompt for the video generator that describes the actions and general progression of the video in that segment that ends with the end image.
